mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense(form_idx, doc_idx, ex_date, ex_item, description, ex_amount, remark) VALUES(#{form_idx}, #{doc_idx}, #{ex_date}, #{ex_item}, #{description}, #{ex_amount}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(ex_date) AS month, form_idx, SUM(ex_amount) AS total_amount FROM expense WHERE YEAR(ex_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(ex_date), form_idx ORDER BY month ASC, form_idx ASC
